keyword: how much calories are in a whopper
title: How Many Calories in a Whopper?
meta_description: Discover how much calories are in a Whopper from Burger King, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories in a Whopper?
assumptions: Standard Burger King Whopper: flame-grilled beef patty, sesame seed bun, lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, onions, mayonnaise, ketchup; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations. Values based on standard U.S. Burger King data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A standard Whopper has about 670 calories and 28 g of protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How much calories are in a Whopper?
What's the protein in a Whopper?
faqs.a: About 28 g of protein per Whopper.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a Whopper?
faqs.a: Yes, 51 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 11 g sugars.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Whopper?
Does a Whopper have trans fat?
faqs.a: About 1 g of trans fat per Whopper from the beef and bun.
